message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get 40%.
Alice, let's be fair. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This deal benefits both of us - you get something now before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Bob, my offer stands from round 1.  Inflation is hurting both of us now, so let's settle this quickly. I'll take 55%.
